name: test-sample
description: Insights about your application dependencies: Security, License compatibility and AI based guidance to choose appropriate dependencies for your application.

scripts.ui-test: extest setup-tests './out/ui-test/dependencyAnalytics.js --storage test-resources --code_settings settings.json --extensions_dir .test-extensions' && npm run install-vsix && extest run-tests  './out/ui-test/dependencyAnalytics.js' --code_settings settings.json --extensions_dir .test-extensions  --storage test-resources
